children.name: NotificationService

should create an itinerary reminder

should throw ConflictException if itinerary reminder already exist

should return an array of itinerary reminders
should return an empty array of itinerary reminders if none found

should return an itinerary reminder with associated itinerary id

should update an itinerary reminder

should remove an itinerary reminder

should schedule a sendEmail job and verify it runs
should throw a ConflictException on already scheduled reminders
should throw a BadRequestException on jobs with date in past

should calculate scheduled date correctly
should throw BadRequestException on improper reminder option
cancelScheduledEmail
should cancel an existing scheduled email job
should throw a NotFoundException if job doesnt exist
